AEC.BK.summary: AEC Securities Public Company Limited provides securities brokerage services to individual and institutional investors in Thailand. It offers equity services, such as cash account, cash balance account, and credit balance account; securities trading and underwriting; investment advisory; derivatives brokerage; securities borrowing and lending; private fund management; mutual funds; block trade; bonds; securities analysis; and investment banking services, including securities design and offering, debt restructuring, merger, and financial advisory services. The company was formerly known as United Securities Public Company Limited and changed its name to AEC Securities Public Company Limited in June 2013. AEC Securities Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1971 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

AIRA-R.BK.summary: AIRA Capital Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides financial advisory services in Thailand. It operates through four segments: Securities and Investment, Advisory and Investment Banking, Factoring, and Rental and Service. The company offers securities brokerage, securities trading, investment advisory, securities underwriting, securities borrowing and lending, derivatives brokerage, and private fund management services. It also provides investment banking services, including mergers and acquisitions, such as asset/company valuation, leverage buyout, and joint ventures and spin-offs; and capital restructurings and other financial advisory services to small and medium-sized enterprises, public and privately-owned companies, government related entities, and private equity firms. In addition, the company provides mergers and acquisitions advisory services, hire purchase, finance lease, and operating lease for industrial equipment and machines; and private fund, mutual fund management, and securities brokerage of investment units services. Further, it engages in receivable factoring, venture capital, property development, and asset management businesses. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

AIRA.BK.summary: AIRA Capital Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides financial advisory services in Thailand. It operates through four segments: Securities and Investment, Advisory and Investment Banking, Factoring, and Rental and Service. The company offers securities brokerage, securities trading, investment advisory, securities underwriting, securities borrowing and lending, derivatives brokerage, and private fund management services. It also provides investment banking services, including mergers and acquisitions, such as asset/company valuation, leverage buyout, and joint ventures and spin-offs; and capital restructurings and other financial advisory services to small and medium-sized enterprises, public and privately-owned companies, government related entities, and private equity firms. In addition, the company provides mergers and acquisitions advisory services, hire purchase, finance lease, and operating lease for industrial equipment and machines; and private fund, mutual fund management, and securities brokerage of investment units services. Further, it engages in receivable factoring, venture capital, property development, and asset management businesses. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

ASP.BK.long_name: Asia Plus Group Holdings Public Company Limited
ASP.BK.summary: Asia Plus Group Holdings Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the securities business in Thailand. The company operates in four segments: Securities and Derivatives Brokerage, Investment Banking, Fund Management, and Investment Trading. The company provides securities and derivatives brokering and dealing services for local and foreign investors; investment and derivative advisory; security underwriting; securities borrowing and lending; venture capital management; and private, derivatives, and mutual fund management services, as well as act as a financial advisor for the issuance and public offering of securities. It also offers investment banking services, such as mergers and acquisitions advisory, debt and corporate restructuring, and valuation services for shares, as well as invests in unit trusts and buys, sells, and exchanges securities. The company was formerly known as Asia Plus Group Holdings Securities Public Company Limited and changed its name to Asia Plus Group Holdings Public Company Limited in July 2015. Asia Plus Group Holdings Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1974 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

BFIT-R.BK.summary: Srisawad Finance Public Company Limited engages in the finance business in Thailand. The company offers money market investment products and services, such as deposit receipts, certificates of deposit, promissory notes, and bills of exchange for individuals, juristic persons, corporate entities, financial institutes, foundations, and associations. It also provides commercial lending and project finance services that comprise commercial loan facilities, such as loans for working capital with various short-term maturities; medium and long term loan facilities to finance expansion or capital expenditures; and aval and guarantee facilities. In addition, the company provides debenture holder representative services; and invests in securities, such as common stocks, government bonds, state enterprise bonds, private bonds, bills of exchange, etc. in primary and secondary markets. The company was formerly known as Bangkok First Investment & Trust Public Company Limited. Srisawad Finance Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1969 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

BFIT.BK.summary: Srisawad Finance Public Company Limited engages in the finance business in Thailand. CGH-R.BK.long_name: Country Group Holdings Public Company Limited
CGH-R.BK.summary: Country Group Holdings Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, primarily engages in the securities business in Thailand. It operates through three segments: Securities and Derivatives Brokerage, Investment Banking, and Securities and Derivatives Trading. The company offers securities brokerage, securities trading, securities underwriting, investment advisory, mutual fund management, private fund management, stock borrowing and lending, and venture capital management services. It is also involved in the derivatives trading, energy, finance advisory, and investment banking businesses. The company is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

CGH.BK.long_name: Country Group Holdings Public Company Limited
CGH.BK.summary: Country Group Holdings Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, primarily engages in the securities business in Thailand. It operates through three segments: Securities and Derivatives Brokerage, Investment Banking, and Securities and Derivatives Trading. The company offers securities brokerage, securities trading, securities underwriting, investment advisory, mutual fund management, private fund management, stock borrowing and lending, and venture capital management services. It is also involved in the derivatives trading, energy, finance advisory, and investment banking businesses. The company is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

FSS-R.BK.long_name: Finansia Syrus Securities Public Company Limited
FSS-R.BK.summary: Finansia Syrus Securities Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates in the securities and derivatives brokerage business in Thailand. The company operates in three segments: Securities and Derivatives Brokerage, Investment Banking, and Proprietary Trading. It offers securities brokerage and trading, investment and financial advisory, securities underwriting, derivative brokering, securities borrowing and lending, and mutual fund and private fund management services. As of December 31, 2020, the company had 25 branches. The company was formerly known as Syrus Securities Public Company Limited and changed its name to Finansia Syrus Securities Public Company Limited in June 2009. Finansia Syrus Securities Public Company Limited was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

FSS.BK.long_name: Finansia Syrus Securities Public Company Limited
FSS.BK.summary: Finansia Syrus Securities Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates in the securities and derivatives brokerage business in Thailand. GBX-R.BK.long_name: Globlex Holding Management Public Company Limited
GBX-R.BK.summary: Globlex Holding Management Public Company Limited, an investment holding company, engages in gold trading business in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Gold Bar Trading Business, Securities Business, and Other Business. It is also involved in the securities, investment, and financial advisory businesses. The company was incorporated in 2003 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

GBX.BK.long_name: Globlex Holding Management Public Company Limited
GBX.BK.summary: Globlex Holding Management Public Company Limited, an investment holding company, engages in gold trading business in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Gold Bar Trading Business, Securities Business, and Other Business. It is also involved in the securities, investment, and financial advisory businesses. The company was incorporated in 2003 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

KGI-R.BK.summary: KGI Securities (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the securities business in Thailand. The company provides securities brokerage, securities dealing, investment advisory, securities underwriting, securities borrowing and lending, and securities registrar services. It also offers over-the-counter derivate products, equity derivative, exchange traded fund, and fixed income services; and investment banking services, including fund raising, IPOs, secondary market placements, mergers and acquisitions, firm valuations, loan arrangements, debt restructuring, and other advisory services. In addition, the company provides proprietary trading, wealth management, derivatives brokerage, financial instruments, and financial advisory services; and operates as a sales agent for mutual fund units. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 14 branches in Bangkok and other provinces. The company was formerly known as KGI Securities One Public Company Limited and changed its name to KGI Securities (Thailand) Public Company Limited in May 2001. KGI Securities (Thailand) Public Company Limited was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

KGI.BK.summary: KGI Securities (Thailand) Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the securities business in Thailand. The company provides securities brokerage, securities dealing, investment advisory, securities underwriting, securities borrowing and lending, and securities registrar services. It also offers over-the-counter derivate products, equity derivative, exchange traded fund, and fixed income services; and investment banking services, including fund raising, IPOs, secondary market placements, mergers and acquisitions, firm valuations, loan arrangements, debt restructuring, and other advisory services. In addition, the company provides proprietary trading, wealth management, derivatives brokerage, financial instruments, and financial advisory services; and operates as a sales agent for mutual fund units. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 14 branches in Bangkok and other provinces. The company was formerly known as KGI Securities One Public Company Limited and changed its name to KGI Securities (Thailand) Public Company Limited in May 2001. KGI Securities (Thailand) Public Company Limited was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

MBKET-R.BK.long_name: Maybank Kim Eng Securities (Thailand) Public Company Limited
MBKET-R.BK.summary: Maybank Kim Eng Securities (Thailand) Public Company Limited provides investment and securities services to corporate and individual customers in Thailand. It operates in two segments, Securities Business and Investment Banking. The company provides online trading, retail broking, derivatives trading and warrants, offshore trading, mutual funds, and institutional sale services. It also offers investment banking services, such as equity/equity-linked capital market services, including IPO/PO/PP, privatization, listing and going public, dual listings, and listing in Singapore; and debt capital market products comprising Baht debentures, loans, property funds, securitization products, project finance, and structure finance. In addition, the company provides financial advisory services in the areas of mergers and acquisitions, financial partners and/or strategic partners, independent financial advisors, joint ventures, DI fund placement, and debt restructuring. Further, it offers corporate banking, multi-currency cash management, trade financing, transaction banking, and treasury services, as well as new instruments comprising convertible debenture, warrants and options, and derivative products. Additionally, the company provides securities trading, borrowing, and lending; securities and derivatives brokerage; underwriting; investment and wealth management; and block trade services. As of December 31, 2020, it operated 30 branches in Bangkok and upcountry. The company was formerly known as Kim Eng Securities (Thailand) Public Company Limited. The company was incorporated in 1996 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Maybank Kim Eng Securities (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Maybank Kim Eng Holdings Limited.

MBKET.BK.long_name: Maybank Kim Eng Securities (Thailand) Public Company Limited

TNITY-R.BK.summary: Trinity Watthana Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, engages in the securities business in Thailand. It operates through two segments, Securities and Derivatives Business; and Financial Advisory Business and Investment Banking. The company is involved in the broking, trading, borrowing and lending, and underwriting of securities. It also provides investment advisory, private fund asset management, and financial advisory services, as well as operates as a derivatives agent. In addition, the company invests in other companies and listed companies. As of December 31, 2020, it had 6 branches. The company was incorporated in 2001 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

UOBKH-R.BK.long_name: UOB Kay Hian Securities (Thailand) Public Company Limited
UOBKH-R.BK.summary: UOB Kay Hian Securities (Thailand) Public Company Limited engages in the securities brokerage, dealing, and derivatives business in Thailand. The company operates in three segments: Securities and Derivatives Business, Financial Advisory Business, and Investing Business. It offers securities brokerage, trading, and underwriting, derivatives agent, securities borrowing and lending, and investment advisory service. The company was incorporated in 1998 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. UOB Kay Hian Securities (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of UOB-Kay Hian Holdings Limited.

UOBKH.BK.long_name: UOB Kay Hian Securities (Thailand) Public Company Limited

ZMICO-R.BK.summary: Seamico Capital Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the securities business in Thailand. The company offers securities brokerage, securities and derivatives trading, investment advisory, securities underwriting, financial advisory, derivatives agency, online securities trading, securities borrowing and lending, wealth advisory, international market securities trading, and derivative warrants, as well as mutual, private, and provident fund management services. It is also involved in the foreign exchange business. The company was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
